Here are values that failed for midpoint_A and midpoint_B; none of them fail in midpoint_C.  The step-by-step working for the formula of midpoint_C ((x & y) + ((x ^ y) >> 1) is shown for each input.

midpoint_A failures:
  These inputs fail midpoint_A because the first input is a positive integer and the second input is the minimum integer, causing an overflow.
    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out 2147483647 -2147483648
      input x: 2147483647
      input y: -2147483648
      midpoint_A = 2147483647
      midpoint_C = -1
        x =         01111111111111111111111111111111
        y =         10000000000000000000000000000000
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000000
        x^y =       11111111111111111111111111111111
        (x^y)>>1 =  11111111111111111111111111111111
        midpoint =  11111111111111111111111111111111 

    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out 1 -2147483648
      input x: 1
      input y: -2147483648
      midpoint_A = 1073741824
      midpoint_C = -1073741824
        x =         00000000000000000000000000000001
        y =         10000000000000000000000000000000
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000000
        x^y =       10000000000000000000000000000001
        (x^y)>>1 =  11000000000000000000000000000000
        midpoint =  11000000000000000000000000000000

  These inputs fail midpoint_A because the first input is the minimum integer and the second input is. anon-negative integer, which causes an overflow.
    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -2147483648 2147483647
      input x: -2147483648
      input y: 2147483647
      midpoint_A = -2147483648
      midpoint_C = -1
        x =         10000000000000000000000000000000
        y =         01111111111111111111111111111111
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000000
        x^y =       11111111111111111111111111111111
        (x^y)>>1 =  11111111111111111111111111111111
        midpoint =  11111111111111111111111111111111

    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -2147483648 1
      input x: -2147483648
      input y: 1
      midpoint_A = 1073741825
      midpoint_C = -1073741824
        x =         10000000000000000000000000000000
        y =         00000000000000000000000000000001
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000000
        x^y =       10000000000000000000000000000001
        (x^y)>>1 =  11000000000000000000000000000000
        midpoint =  11000000000000000000000000000000
      
    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -2147483648 0
      input x: -2147483648
      input y: 0
      midpoint_A = 1073741824
      midpoint_C = -1073741824
        x =         10000000000000000000000000000000
        y =         00000000000000000000000000000000
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000000
        x^y =       10000000000000000000000000000000
        (x^y)>>1 =  11000000000000000000000000000000
        midpoint =  11000000000000000000000000000000

  These inputs fail midpoint_A because the sum of the second input and the complement of the first input is outside of the 32-bit integer range.
    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out 2147483647 -2147483647
      input x: 2147483647
      input y: -2147483647
      midpoint_A = -2147483648
      midpoint_C = 0
        x =         01111111111111111111111111111111
        y =         10000000000000000000000000000001
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000001
        x^y =       11111111111111111111111111111110
        (x^y)>>1 =  11111111111111111111111111111111
        midpoint =  00000000000000000000000000000000

    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -2147483647 2147483647
      input x: -2147483647
      input y: 2147483647
      midpoint_A = -2147483648
      midpoint_C = 0
        x =         10000000000000000000000000000001
        y =         01111111111111111111111111111111
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000001
        x^y =       11111111111111111111111111111110
        (x^y)>>1 =  11111111111111111111111111111111
        midpoint =  00000000000000000000000000000000

    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -2147483647 1
      input x: -2147483647
      input y: 1
      midpoint_A = 1073741825
      midpoint_C = -1073741823
        x =         10000000000000000000000000000001
        y =         00000000000000000000000000000001
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000001
        x^y =       10000000000000000000000000000000
        (x^y)>>1 =  11000000000000000000000000000000
        midpoint =  11000000000000000000000000000001

    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -2147483645 5
      input x: -2147483645
      input y: 5
      midpoint_A = 1073741828
      midpoint_C = -1073741820
        x =         10000000000000000000000000000011
        y =         00000000000000000000000000000101
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000001
        x^y =       10000000000000000000000000000110
        (x^y)>>1 =  11000000000000000000000000000011
        midpoint =  11000000000000000000000000000100
      
    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out 5 -2147483645
      input x: 5
      input y: -2147483645
      midpoint_A = 1073741827
      midpoint_C = -1073741820
        x =         00000000000000000000000000000101
        y =         10000000000000000000000000000011
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000001
        x^y =       10000000000000000000000000000110
        (x^y)>>1 =  11000000000000000000000000000011
        midpoint =  11000000000000000000000000000100
          
    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out 2147483647 -5
      input x: 2147483647
      input y: -5
      midpoint_A = -1073741827
      midpoint_C = 1073741821
        x =         01111111111111111111111111111111
        y =         11111111111111111111111111111011
        x&y =       01111111111111111111111111111011
        x^y =       10000000000000000000000000000100
        (x^y)>>1 =  11000000000000000000000000000010
        midpoint =  00111111111111111111111111111101

    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -5 2147483647
      input x: -5
      input y: 2147483647
      midpoint_A = -1073741827
      midpoint_C = 1073741821
        x =         11111111111111111111111111111011
        y =         01111111111111111111111111111111
        x&y =       01111111111111111111111111111011
        x^y =       10000000000000000000000000000100
        (x^y)>>1 =  11000000000000000000000000000010
        midpoint =  00111111111111111111111111111101
      


midpoint_B failures:
  These inputs fail midpoint_B if both of the inputs are negative or if only one input is negative but it has a greater magnitude than the non-negative input, because the bitwise shift doesn't preserve the leading one. 
    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -10 5
      input x: -10
      input y: 5
      midpoint_B = 2147483645
      midpoint_C = -3
        x =         11111111111111111111111111110110
        y =         00000000000000000000000000000101
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000100
        x^y =       11111111111111111111111111110011
        (x^y)>>1 =  11111111111111111111111111111001
        midpoint =  11111111111111111111111111111101

    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -10 -20
      input x: -10
      input y: -20
      midpoint_B = 2147483633
      midpoint_C = -15
        x =         11111111111111111111111111110110
        y =         11111111111111111111111111101100
        x&y =       11111111111111111111111111100100
        x^y =       00000000000000000000000000011010
        (x^y)>>1 =  00000000000000000000000000001101
        midpoint =  11111111111111111111111111110001

    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -2147483648 2147483647
      input x: -2147483648
      input y: 2147483647
      midpoint_B = 2147483647
      midpoint_C = -1
        x =         10000000000000000000000000000000
        y =         01111111111111111111111111111111
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000000
        x^y =       11111111111111111111111111111111
        (x^y)>>1 =  11111111111111111111111111111111
        midpoint =  11111111111111111111111111111111

    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -2147483648 -1
      input x: -2147483648
      input y: -1
      midpoint_B = 1073741823
      midpoint_C = -1073741825
        x =         10000000000000000000000000000000
        y =         11111111111111111111111111111111
        x&y =       10000000000000000000000000000000
        x^y =       01111111111111111111111111111111
        (x^y)>>1 =  00111111111111111111111111111111
        midpoint =  10111111111111111111111111111111

    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -2147483648 0
      input x: -2147483648
      input y: 0
      midpoint_B = 1073741824
      midpoint_C = -1073741824
        x =         10000000000000000000000000000000
        y =         00000000000000000000000000000000
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000000
        x^y =       10000000000000000000000000000000
        (x^y)>>1 =  11000000000000000000000000000000
        midpoint =  11000000000000000000000000000000

    ~/.../assign3/task1$ ./a.out -2147483648 1
      input x: -2147483648
      input y: 1
      midpoint_B = 1073741824
      midpoint_C = -1073741824
        x =         10000000000000000000000000000000
        y =         00000000000000000000000000000001
        x&y =       00000000000000000000000000000000
        x^y =       10000000000000000000000000000001
        (x^y)>>1 =  11000000000000000000000000000000
        midpoint =  11000000000000000000000000000000
